item.title: 西部数据将出售价值31.7亿美元的闪迪股权
item.description: 闪存制造商闪迪周三表示，西部数据将出售其价值31.7亿美元的股份。【原文：Flash memory maker Sandisk on Wednesday said that Western Digital will sell a stake worth $3.17 billion in the company.】

item.title: 微软表示正按计划向"全球南方"地区投入500亿美元推动人工智能发展
item.description: 微软周三表示，该公司正按计划推进，将在本十年结束前投入500亿美元，助力人工智能技术向"全球南方"国家扩展。【原文：Microsoft on Wednesday said it is on pace to invest $50 billion by the end of the decade to help expand AI to countries across the 'Global South'.】

item.title: 早盘要闻：农历新年交易清淡之际，日内瓦会谈与通胀数据成焦点
item.description: 罗基·斯威夫特带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日动态【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，黑石、EQT和CVC对大众汽车旗下Everllence部门提出收购要约。
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，知情人士透露，大众汽车旗下Everllence部门已吸引包括黑石、EQT和CVC在内的顶级私募股权基金竞购。【原文：Volkswagen has attracted bids from top private equity funds including Blackstone , EQT and CVC for its Everllence division, The Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道称，欧洲央行行长拉加德预计将在明年任期届满前离任
item.description: 《金融时报》周三援引知情人士消息报道称，欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德预计将在其八年任期结束前离职，该任期将于2027年10月届满。【原文：Christine Lagarde is expected to leave as president of the European Central Bank (ECB) before the end of her eight-year term that expires in October 2027 , the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing a person familiar with her thinking.】

item.title: 内华达州提起诉讼，阻止卡尔希公司在该州运营预测市场
item.description: 内华达州博彩监管机构周二提起诉讼，试图阻止预测市场运营商Kalshi提供赛事合约，该合约将允许该州居民对包括橄榄球和篮球比赛在内的体育赛事进行投注。【原文：Nevada gaming regulators filed a lawsuit on Tuesday seeking to block prediction market operator Kalshi from offering events contracts that would allow its residents to bet on sports including football and basketball games.】

item.title: 印度Yotta公司将斥资20亿美元打造人工智能中心，采用英伟达Blackwell芯片
item.description: 印度数据中心公司Yotta Data Services周三宣布，将斥资逾20亿美元建设亚洲最大的人工智能计算中心之一，该项目将采用英伟达最新的Blackwell Ultra芯片。【原文：Indian data centre company Yotta Data Services said on Wednesday it will build one of Asia's largest AI computing hubs using Nvidia's latest Blackwell Ultra chips, in a project costing more than $2 billion.】

item.title: 美国铝业公司因非法砍伐澳大利亚原生森林被迫支付3800万美元罚款
item.description: 澳大利亚环境部周三表示，美国铝业公司将支付5500万澳元（约合3900万美元）用于修复其在西澳大利亚州非法砍伐的原生森林，此前该公司为开采铝土矿而破坏了该区域。【原文：U.S. aluminium company Alcoa will pay A$55 million ($39 million) to remediate native forest it illegally cleared in Western Australia in order to mine bauxite, Australia’s environment ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回针对野翅餐厅的诉讼，称其"毫无实质内容"
item.description: 美国联邦法官周二驳回了针对布法罗野翅餐厅的诉讼。该诉讼指控这家连锁餐厅及体育酒吧通过销售非真正去骨的鸡翅来欺骗消费者。【原文：A U.S. federal judge threw out on Tuesday a lawsuit against Buffalo Wild Wings that alleged the restaurant and sports bar chain deceived consumers by selling boneless wings that are not actually de-boned chicken wings.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，尽管人工智能担忧持续存在；油价下跌，因美伊举行会谈
item.description: 周三亚洲股市走高，尽管国际市场再度笼罩在人工智能担忧之中，而伊朗宣称与美国核谈判取得进展后，油价承压下行。【原文：Asian stocks pushed higher on Wednesday despite the renewed artificial intelligence worries gripping international markets, while oil prices were under pressure after Iran touted progress in nuclear negotiations with the United States.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命凯瑟琳·奥唐奈为北美杠杆融资业务负责人
item.description: 美国摩根大通银行周二任命资深银行家凯瑟琳·奥唐奈为杠杆融资部门负责人，该任命将于今年晚些时候生效。【原文：U.S. lender JPMorgan Chase on Tuesday appointed veteran Catherine O'Donnell as head of its leveraged finance department, effective later this year.】

item.title: 油价下跌，因市场对美伊紧张局势缓和的预期升温
item.description: 周三油价小幅下跌，因美国与伊朗的谈判取得进展，市场对两国紧张局势缓和的预期升温，同时中东产油国供应中断的风险有所降低。【原文：Oil prices fell slightly on Wednesday as talks between the United States and Iran progressed, raising hopes for a de-escalation of bilateral tensions and lowering risks of supply disruptions from the Middle Eastern oil producer.】

item.title: 特斯拉通过调整营销策略，成功避免加州监管机构对其实施停业处罚。
item.description: 美国电动汽车制造商特斯拉在加州停止使用"自动驾驶"一词进行车辆营销后，将避免在该州被暂停经销商和制造商执照30天的处罚，监管机构周二表示。【原文：Tesla will avoid a 30-day suspension of its dealer and manufacturer licenses in California after the U.S. electric vehicle maker stopped using the term "autopilot" in marketing of its vehicles in the state, a regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: YouTube在美国遭遇超过24万用户无法访问，Downdetector数据显示
item.description: 据故障监测网站Downdetector.com数据显示，谷歌旗下YouTube平台周二在美国遭遇故障，影响用户超过24万人。【原文：Alphabet-owned YouTube was down for more than 240,000 users in the United States on Tuesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 加州设立人工智能监管机构，并推进对xAI公司的调查
item.description: 加州总检察长罗伯·邦塔周二接受路透社采访时表示，其办公室正在建立人工智能问责计划，同时对埃隆·马斯克旗下xAI公司生成未经同意的色情图像展开调查。【原文：California Attorney General Rob Bonta is building an artificial intelligence accountability program as his office probes Elon Musk’s xAI over the generation of non-consensual sexually explicit images, he told Reuters in an interview on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美元维持涨势，因市场聚焦和平谈判及美联储会议纪要
item.description: 周三美元汇率保持坚挺，因地缘政治风险令市场持续承压，投资者正等待美联储会议纪要以获取未来降息的信号。【原文：The dollar held its ground on Wednesday as geopolitical risks kept markets on edge and investors awaited minutes from the Federal Reserve for signals on future rate cuts.】

item.title: 安哥拉知名记者遭捕食者间谍软件锁定
item.description: 国际特赦组织周二发布的一份报告称，安哥拉知名记者泰谢拉·坎迪多使用的手机在2024年5月曾短暂感染间谍软件供应商Intellexa的监控软件。【原文：A phone used by prominent Angolan journalist Teixeira Candido was infected with surveillance software from spyware vendor Intellexa for a brief period in May 2024, Amnesty International said in a report published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 纳维恩特借款人开始收到消费者监管机构案件的赔偿金
item.description: 据美国消费者金融保护局官网消息，据称受到教育贷款公司Navient损害的借款人已开始从该机构设立的1亿美元赔偿基金中获得赔付。【原文：Borrowers allegedly harmed by the educational loan finance company Navient are beginning to receive payments from a $100 million compensation fund created by the top U.S. consumer financial watchdog, according to the agency's website.】

item.title: 交易日：人工智能颠覆、美伊核谈判、降息预期令投资者如坐针毡
item.description: 周二华尔街股市震荡收涨，投资者在持续担忧人工智能支出及其可能引发的经济动荡与伊朗就美伊核谈判进展释放的积极信号之间权衡取舍。【原文：Wall Street stocks see-sawed to nominal gains on Tuesday as investors juggled ongoing concerns over spending on artificial intelligence and the potential economic disruptions AI may bring, with positive signals from Iran regarding the progress of nuclear talks with the United States.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织敦促日本继续加息，避免降低消费税
item.description: 国际货币基金组织敦促日本继续提高利率，避免进一步放松财政政策，并警告称削减消费税将削弱其应对未来经济冲击的能力。【原文：The International Monetary Fund urged Japan to keep raising interest rates and avoid loosening fiscal policy further, warning that trimming the consumption tax would erode its capacity to respond to future economic shocks.】

item.title: Starboard Value增持Kenvue和Riot Platforms股份
item.description: 激进投资者Starboard Value LP在12月季度增持了加密货币公司Riot Platforms和消费者健康公司Kenvue的股份，同时减持了Rogers Corp、News Corp、Salesforce和Autodesk的持股。该公司周二向美国证券交易委员会提交的文件显示了上述操作。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value LP increased its stakes in cryptocurrency firm Riot Platforms and consumer health company Kenvue in the December quarter, while reducing its shares in Rogers Corp , News Corp , Salesforce and Autodesk , according to a filing on Tuesday to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 好时公司因替代原料遭质疑，花生酱杯发明者之孙发声
item.description: 里氏花生酱杯的发明者之孙于上周末在社交媒体发文，批评这家热门糖果的制造商好时公司涉嫌更改产品配料。【原文：The grandson of the man who created the Reese's Peanut Butter Cup took to social media over the weekend to criticize the popular candy's manufacturer, The Hershey Company , about alleged changes in the confection's ingredients.】

item.title: 随着增长项目接近尾声，桑托斯将裁员10%，年度利润未达预期
item.description: 澳大利亚石油天然气生产商桑托斯公司周三公布年度利润下滑幅度超出预期，受大宗商品价格疲软拖累，并表示随着主要增长项目接近完工，将裁减约10%的员工。【原文：Australian oil and gas producer Santos Ltd reported a steeper-than-expected drop in annual profit on Wednesday, hurt by weak commodity prices, and said it would reduce its headcount by about 10% as major growth projects near completion.】

item.title: 调查显示：欧洲对美国游客吸引力减弱，转而吸引中国、印度旅客
item.description: 欧洲旅游委员会周三发布的一项调查显示，今年中国和印度游客将弥补美国游客赴欧旅游增长放缓的缺口，预计欧洲国际游客到访量将增长6.2%。【原文：Chinese and Indian tourists are set to make up for a potential slowdown in growth from U.S. travellers to Europe this year, according to a survey published on Wednesday by the European Travel Commission, with international arrivals to the continent set to rise by 6.2%.】

item.title: 澳大利亚桑托斯公司计划裁员10%以降低成本
item.description: 澳大利亚石油天然气生产商桑托斯公司周三表示，为削减成本，计划裁员约10%。该公司公布的全年基本利润未达市场预期。【原文：Australian oil and gas producer Santos Ltd said on Wednesday it was targeting a headcount reduction of around 10% to cut costs, as it reported a full-year underlying profit that missed market expectations.】

item.title: Cadence季度利润与营收超预期，得益于强劲的AI相关需求
item.description: Cadence Design Systems周二公布的季度营收超出预期，因复杂人工智能处理器的强劲需求推动其芯片设计软件销售增长。【原文：Cadence Design Systems beat quarterly revenue estimates on Tuesday, as strong demand for complex artificial intelligence processors lifted sales of its chip design software.】

item.title: 金佰利·克拉克收购案中，肯维尔季度业绩超预期，同时宣布裁员计划
item.description: 泰诺制造商健威公司周二公布的第四季度业绩超出华尔街预期，同时宣布将进行全球性裁员，该公司正朝着被金佰利·克拉克收购的既定计划迈进。【原文：Tylenol-maker Kenvue on Tuesday beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter results and announced a global workforce reduction, as it proceeds toward a planned takeover by Kimberly-Clark.】

item.title: Palo Alto Networks下调年度利润预期，交易成本拖累业绩，股价下跌
item.description: Palo Alto Networks周二下调了年度利润预期，表明近期为增强人工智能能力而进行的收购导致成本上升，该网络安全公司股价在盘后交易中下跌约7%。【原文：Palo Alto Networks trimmed its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, signaling rising costs from recent acquisitions to enhance AI capabilities, sending the cybersecurity company's shares down around 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会就波音收购斯皮里特航空系统公司案最终敲定同意令
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周二宣布，已就波音收购斯皮里特航空系统公司一案达成最终同意令。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Tuesday said it finalized a consent order involving Boeing's acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems.】

item.title: Waymo为在无人驾驶出租车运营中使用远程协助人员进行辩护
item.description: 谷歌旗下自动驾驶公司Waymo周二面对国会质询时，为其使用远程辅助人员的做法辩护，并表示这些人员从未被用于操控自动驾驶出租车进行道路行驶。【原文：Alphabet self-driving unit Waymo on Tuesday defended its use of remote assistance personnel in the face of questions from Congress and said they have never been used to move robotaxis in on-road operations.】
